summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1565, for the improvement of Fuhrman Avenue, from Shelby Street to Franklin Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same and constructing all necessary bulkheads and retaining walls, under Ordinance No. 16785 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
